Casuнsticas analisadas em Belйm mostram cerca de 18-20% de crianзas atй 12 anos acometidas pela micose, quadro epidemiolуgico ъnico no panorama mundial, demonstrando infecзгo a partir do ambiente desde os primeiros anos de vida. PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Brain Decoding usando o EEG: Incremento cognitivo em indivнduos saudбveis e dinвmica espaзo-temporal das oscilaзхes corticais em indivнduos epilйpticos
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O presente projeto trata da aplicaзгo do conceito de Brain Decoding, que significa decodificar o sinal neural de modo a ter inferкncias sobre o comportamento normal ou nгo. Essa tarefa de decodificaзгo serб implementada usando eletroencefalografia (EEG) em dois nъcleos de abordagem distintos, chamados aqui de nъcleo bбsico e aplicado, respectivamente. No nъcleo bбsico, serгo investigados parвmetros do EEG registrado de operadores da mineradora Vale, complexo S11D em Carajбs, enquanto os mesmos realizam tarefa de simulaзгo da operaзгo em simuladores de realidade virtual, parte essencial do treinamento desses trabalhadores. A intenзгo com esse nъcleo й a extraзгo de caracterнsticas do EEG que indiquem a demanda em funзхes cognitivas como atenзгo e memуria de trabalho. Essa extraзгo envolverб o uso de tйcnicas modernas de processamento digital de sinais e algoritmos de aprendizado de mбquina. Os principais parвmetros a serem usados para definir as caracterнsticas do registro sгo os valores de fase por frequкncia, que indicarгo o comprometimento funcional de бreas corticais. Posteriormente, de posse das caracterнsticas do registro, um treinamento cognitivo serб aplicado de modo a modular os parвmetros do EEG relacionados аs caracterнsticas que representam a atividade de funзхes cognitivas relacionadas com a boa operaзгo. A intenзгo com isso й a promoзгo de saъde desses trabalhadores, com consequente aumento de produtividade e inclusгo de indivнduos com baixa produtividade por meio do treinamento cognitivo. O nъcleo aplicado vai usar tйcnicas bastante similares para estudar o fluxo espaзo-temporal de informaзгo em pacientes que sofrem de epilepsia focal do lobo temporal. Essa abordagem usarб as caracterнsticas do EEG, tambйm extraнdas usando algoritmos baseados em aprendizado de mбquina, para localizar e estudar o fluxo da oscilaзгo epileptogкnica a partir do lobo temporal. Com isso o objetivo precнpuo й o estudo da epilepsia do lobo temporal como um problema de circuito. Ou seja, uma alteraзгo do conectoma cortical em um ponto da rede, afetando desse modo outros pontos. As duas abordagens fazem parte do cerne que agora se estabelece no Laboratуrio de Neurofisiologia Eduardo Oswaldo Cruz da UFPA, que й o desenvolvimento e aplicaзгo de mйtodos e tйcnicas de ponta para estudar a cogniзгo em indivнduos saudбveis ou que apresentem alteraзхes passнveis de serem estudadas usando eletroencefalografia.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The project concerns the application of the concept of Brain Decoding, which means the decoding of the neural signal with the aim to produce inferences about normal and altered behavior. The decoding procedure will be implemented using electroencephalography (EEG) in two core approaches, named here as basic and applied core, respectively. In the basic core it will be investigated the EEG parameters from workers of Vale mining company S11D in Carajбs, while the workers perform a routine in a virtual reality environment, which is a fundamental part of their training. The key goal in this core is the extraction of EEG features that might indicate the cognitive demands such as attention and working memory. These features extraction will be made using modern methods involving machine learning algorithms. The main parameters to be used are the phase values per frequency that will point towards a functional commitment between cortical areas. After that, once these recording features are available, a cognitive training will take place with the aim to modulate the EEG parameters related to features that represent the action of cognitive functions linked with a good performance of the work operation. The purpose with that is to increment the workers health and thus increase their productivity as well as including in the good performance routine those workers below the required productivity index by means of the cognitive training. The applied core will be using very similar methods to study the spatio-temporal flux of information that happens in patients suffering from temporal lobe epilepsy. This core approach will use the EEG features also by using mainly machine learning algorithms in order to locate trace the flowing of the epileptogenic oscilation starting from the temporal lobe. In this way, the focus is to deal with temporal epilepsy as circuit alteration. That is, an alteration in the cortical conectome in one node of the network that in turn affects the other nodes. Both core approaches are the current framework of the Laboratуrio de Neurofisiologia Eduardo Oswaldo Cruz from UFPA, that is the development and application of forefront methods and technics to study the cognition in heathy subjects or subjects whose cognitive alterations are prone to be analyzed using electroencephalography

Desta forma, estamos propondo neste trabalho avaliar o possнvel efeito protetor do aзaн (Euterpe oleracea) nas alteraзхes eletrofisiolуgicas causadas pelo retinopatia diabetica na retina de modelos animais com diabetes induzida. O eletrorretinograma (ERG) serб o teste utilizado para evidenciar as alteraзхes ou nгo que o quadro experimental ocasionarб na retina dos animais envolvidos no estudo.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: P774 - Mechanisms of Attention: Primate
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: Society for Neuroscience

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Covert spatial attention is usually attributed to be directed without any eye movements. However, we had previously shown that even during visual fixation periods in a sustained attention task, the neural firing rates and stimulus representations in primate visual cortical areas V4 and the inferotemporal cortex (IT) are enhanced only following microsaccades (MS) towards the attended target locations (Lowet et.al., Neuron, 2018). Here we present evidence that the first MS towards the intended (cued) target location kickstarts the attentional modulation of neural firing rates typically observed in area V4. That is, at the neural level, the timing of the first MS structures the process of attention which continues for the remainder of the trial. Subsequent MS during the trial modulate the underlying attentional enhancement. Furthermore, the neural modulations triggered after the MS onsets have significant effects in shaping the object representation, tuning, and selectivity at the target locations. Decoding analyses of V4 firing rates for objects present in the target location confirms that the performance of the decoder is significantly increased for the MS towards intervals towards the attended stimulus compared to intervals following MS directed away from the attended stimulus. The type of MS, towards or away from the target, gives rise to distinct temporal regimes of representation, selectivity, and decoding performance. Such mechanisms are usually obscured when analyzing the neural activity during the full trial periods without taking MS into account. These results thus reveal a major link between spatial attention and its coordination with eye movements. We thus suggest that selective visual attention is not merely a covert cognitive process, but has visuomotor components that shape our ability to dynamically attend, recognize, and act on the objects in the world.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-LIVRO.NOME-DA-EDITORA: Editora da Fundaзгo Santa Cada de Misericуrdia do Parб

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The "Advanced Studies School of Vision and Visual Dysfunctions" and the "2nd International Symposium on Vision and Visual Dysfunctions" were held in Belйm, State of Parб, Brazil, from 13th September to 1st October 2010. It was an international school comprising four courses and a cycle of twenty-two lectures given by outstanding specialists from around the Wolrd, and was the most important event on Visual Sciences ocurring in Brazil this year. The school was organized by the Neuroscience and Cell Biology Teaching Program for Graduate Students of the Biological Sciences Institute, Federal University of Parб (UFPA). Other graduate teaching programs from the UFPA were also associated to the school: Tropical Diseases (Tropical Medicine Nucleus), Behaviour Theory and Research (Behaviour Theory and Research Nucleus), and Gentics and Molecular Biology (Biological Sciences Institute, Federal University of Parб). In addition, two graduate teaching programs from the Institute of Psychology, University of Sгo Paulo (USP), were also associate to the School: Neurosciences and Behaviour and Experimental Psychology. Luiz Carlos de Lima Silveira was the School Chaiman.
Two important Brazilian scientific societies sponsored the school: The Brazilian Society for Neurosciences and Behaviour (SBNeC), affiliated of the Brazilian Society for the Progress of Science (SBPC); and the Brazilian Association for Research in Vision and Ophthalmolog (BRAVO), affiliated to the Association for Research in Vision and Ophthamology (ARVO). The School was financially supported by the following grant agencies: CAPES, CNPq, FADESPA, UFPA-PROPESP / FADESP, BRAVO and UNIMED. 
The "Advanced Studies School of Vision and Visual Dysfunction" presented the most recent achievements of this area of knowledge and discussed the current ideas about how vision works as well as the mechanisms, disgnostic procedures, and treatments of visual dysfunction.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A presente invenзгo provк um mйtodo de aprendizado nгo
supervisionado para aumentar a produtividade de um operador via
treinamento de realidade virtual compreendendo as etapas de:
(a) submeter uma pluralidade de operadores a um treinamento de
realidade virtual em um dispositivo de realidade virtual;
(b) obter informaзхes de indicadores de performance individuais de
cada operador, em que cada indicador de performance й relacionado
a uma atividade de mineraзгo;
(c) definir indicadores de performance satisfatуrios baseado nos
resultados obtidos pela pluralidade de operadores;
(d) para cada operador, identificar indicadores de performance
abaixo dos indicadores de performance satisfatуrios da etapa (c); e
(e) redefinir um treinamento de realidade virtual subsequente
individualizado para cada operador baseado nos indicadores de
performance abaixo dos indicadores de performance satisfatуrios
identificados na etapa (d), e reiniciar o mйtodo a partir da etapa (a).
